articles.title: Dementia risk study finds 11 key factors behind condition - The Guardian
articles.description: Predictive tool ‘significantly outperforms’ others available and could help avert about 40% of cases
articles.content:
Scientists have identified 11 risk factors for dementia and used them to develop a tool that can predict whether someone will develop the condition in the next 14 years.

articles.title: Proton transport through nanoscale corrugations in two-dimensional crystals - Nature.com
articles.description: A study using high-resolution scanning electrochemical cell microscopy attributes proton permeation through defect-free graphene and hexagonal boron nitride to transport across areas of the structure that are under strain.
